name: ApocalFire
description:
Created for the MashUp Game Jam 2022, hosted by "MashUp Games"

Theme:

Genre - Strategy

Theme - Fire

Setting - Medieval

Item - Shield

Choosed with the game randomizer -> https://mashupgames.itch.io/game-randomizer

Gameplay:

ApocalFire is a game where you have to SAVE a village from a misterious fire that is burning everything. To complete this mission you have to MOVE your villagers (using WASD or arrow keys) through the fire and collect shields scraps. When you have enough shields scraps you can place real SHIELDS on the map by pressing F. These shields are a safe place for your VILLAGERS: there, the fire won't come. To save permanently the village you have to collect 3 special RUNES. Runes appear when you place a specific number of shields. GOOD LUCK!
